meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being small.
meanings.sent1: The smallness of the toy made it easy to carry around.
meanings.sent2: I was amazed by the smallness of the ladybug crawling on the leaf.
meanings.sent3: The smallness of the kitten's meow made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: In the vast forest, the smallness of the squirrel seemed insignificant.
meanings.sent5: The smallness of the pebble in my shoe caused a big discomfort.
